ygData.subject: GZ replies to fizzles
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, GZ replied to my post about fizzles. If this information is correct, then I can only assume it is the phenonom John Kim described, where we note the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, GZ replied to my post about fizzles. If this information is
correct, then I can only assume it is the phenonom John Kim described,
where we note the unusual. However, AFTER posting this about song
fizzles, I was playing a level 8 necro. Upon making level 9, I
Immediately began fizzling. Seems strange huh?

> Well, having seen the formula, all I can say is that our random number
> generator sometimes does funky things. There is nothing in our code that
> makes you fizzle / miss notes more upon leveling. :)
>
>
>
> Geoffrey C. Zatkin
> Arch-Mage of Norrath
> ________________________________________________________________
> Game Designer: Verant Interactive

Uldar Ulfangson
36th Bard, Rodect Nife
